Class PaymentRequest

public class PaymentRequest

Description: Class to send info to the BankPaymentFlowController References:

Changes

08/24/2021 Initial version. 09/03/2021 Bill Id is no longer required to allow manual payments.

Fields

@AuraEnabled
@InvocableVariable(required=true description='Amount that will be send for the payment' label='Payment Amount')
public Decimal amount


@AuraEnabled
@InvocableVariable(required=false description='Id of the bill that is being paid' label='Bill Id')
public String billId


@AuraEnabled
@InvocableVariable(required=false description='Id of the commission payment' label='Commission Payment Id')
public String commissionPaymentId


@AuraEnabled
@InvocableVariable(required=false description='This information is sent to the recipient in the notifications' label='External Memo')
public String externalMemo


@AuraEnabled
@InvocableVariable(required=true description='Bank account to pay from' label='From Bank Account Id')
public String fromBankAccountId


@AuraEnabled
@InvocableVariable(required=false description='Internal note that is shown in the bank statement' label='Internal Note')
public String internalNote


@AuraEnabled
@InvocableVariable(required=true description='Unique identifier for the recipient's bank account' label='Recipient's Bank Account Id')
public String toBankAccountId
